description: Settings presets for different work styles

fast.name: Fast Mode
fast.description: Quick iterations, minimal confirmation. Best for experienced users on familiar codebases.
fast.use_case: Rapid prototyping, quick fixes, familiar codebases

thorough.name: Thorough Mode
thorough.description: Detailed explanations, careful validation. Best for learning or complex changes.
thorough.use_case: Learning new codebases, code reviews, critical systems

safe.name: Safe Mode
safe.description: Maximum guardrails. Blocks sensitive files, requires confirmation.
safe.use_case: Production systems, unfamiliar codebases, shared environments

autoformat.name: Auto-Format Mode
autoformat.description: Automatically formats code after every edit. Good for strict style enforcement.
autoformat.use_case: Teams with strict formatting rules, open source contributions

optimized.name: Optimized Mode
optimized.description: Token-efficient settings for maximum context longevity. Reduces cost 60-80% by using lighter models for sub-agents, capping thinking tokens, and compacting context earlier.

env_docs.MAX_THINKING_TOKENS: Caps extended thinking budget (default: 31999). Lower = faster + cheaper, but shallower reasoning.
env_docs.CLAUDE_CODE_AUTOCOMPACT_PCT_OVERRIDE: Context compaction trigger point as % of capacity (default: ~95). Set to 50 to compact earlier, preserving working room but losing older context sooner.
env_docs.CLAUDE_CODE_SUBAGENT_MODEL: Model for Task tool sub-agents (default: inherits parent). Using 'haiku' saves significant tokens on research/exploration tasks.

optimized.use_case: Cost-conscious development, long sessions, token budget management
